name: Mauricio Pérez
bio: Mauricio Pérez, a tenacious midfielder from Costa Rica, combines relentless work ethic with sharp tactical awareness. Known for his exceptional passing range and ability to break up opposition attacks, he embodies the heart of Tierra Alta FC. His signature play style is characterized by game-saving interceptions and the ability to initiate swift counterattacks, making him a key player on the pitch.
